languages.text: "Вени'Хейнрикс прав. Шепоты Его утихли, а расклад Таро, что я сделала, был смутен и запутан. Что-то идет".
languages.translation_comment: Heinrix: "I can sense a slight pressure in the atmosphere, like a distant psy-echo... I presume it is a result of the massacre that happened on these streets."

languages.text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."
languages.original_text: "Вени'Хейнрикс прав. Шепоты Его утихли, а расклад Таро, что я сделала, был смутен и запутан. Что-то идет".

traits.locale_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."
"Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

"Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."
"Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

languages.text: "Veni'Heinrix hat recht. Das Flüstern des Todlosen ist verklungen, und meine Tarotdeutung war vage und verwirrend. Es kommt etwas."
languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

traits.locale_text: "Veni'Heinrix hat recht. Das Flüstern des Todlosen ist verklungen, und meine Tarotdeutung war vage und verwirrend. Es kommt etwas."

languages.text: « Veni'Heinrix dit vrai. Les murmures de l'Immortel se sont tus et les réponses apportées par le tarot sont vagues et confuses. Quelque chose se prépare. »
languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

traits.locale_text: « Veni'Heinrix dit vrai. Les murmures de l'Immortel se sont tus et les réponses apportées par le tarot sont vagues et confuses. Quelque chose se prépare. »

languages.text: «Veni'Heinrix tiene razón. Los susurros del Inmortal se acallan y la lectura del Tarot que he hecho era vaga y confusa. Algo se acerca».
languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

traits.locale_text: «Veni'Heinrix tiene razón. Los susurros del Inmortal se acallan y la lectura del Tarot que he hecho era vaga y confusa. Algo se acerca».

languages.text: 「ハインリックスは正しかった。不死の者の囁きは静まり、私が行ったタロット占いの結果は曖昧で混乱していた。何かが起こるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックスは正しかった。不死の者の囁きは静まり、私が行ったタロット占いの結果は曖昧で混乱していた。何かが起こるんだ」

languages.text: “帷者海因里希说得没错。不死之神的低语越来越轻，圣牌的预示也模糊不清，令人困惑。有什么事情要发生了。”
languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

traits.locale_text: “帷者海因里希说得没错。不死之神的低语越来越轻，圣牌的预示也模糊不清，令人困惑。有什么事情要发生了。”

languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."

languages.text: "Veni'Heinrix haklı. Ölmeyen'in fısıltıları dindi. Yaptığım Tarot okuması da müphem ve kafa karıştırıcıydı. Bir şeyler vuku bulmak üzere."
languages.original_text: "Veni'Heinrix is right. The Undying One's whispers have subsided and the Tarot reading I did was vague and confusing. Something is coming."
